title: Chuck Klosterman: ‘The end of the future’ and the 1990’s
description: Chuck Klosterman, cultural critic and author of “The Nineties” talks to Chuck Todd about how life was different in the last decade before the internet was everywhere, and why Gen X might be, in his words, “the least annoying” of the generations that are still alive.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
